div.p: I’ve thought that plenty of times it’s happened all the time like you know it even happens now, you know, like I’m not
going to get where I want to be you know it’s not helping, whatever, there’s always those negative thoughts that go through your head
but as with people like you know trying to avoid... Not really, like you know there might have been a few like one or two
“yeah stick with it, you can do it” but no I’ve done it myself... I don’t know you just wake up another day and then obviously
you change your mood and then it’s like “no I’m not knocking myself down, I’m not going to let them win” the people that
do want to see me fail and stuff like that and there are people like that, you know, that haven’t achieved their goals so then
when they see people around them achieving their goals that hurts them so then they want to see you down and everything and then
that’s haters isn’t it like you know as it’s called, you know you don’t want them to win like and realistically there are
people like that that do want it and they’re my motivators you know in a weird sense, you know, I’m not going to let them
win just do what you’ve got to do, yeah, and then watch you shine.
